headline: Is Super Micro Computer Stock a Buy Right Now?
summary: Super Micro Computer (NASDAQ: SMCI) was once an untouchable stock.  An independent auditing committee cleared Supermicro of any wrongdoing, and a globally recognized accounting firm signed on as the new auditor.  Now that they are disproven but the stock hasn't seen the benefit, is it time to load up on Supermicro shares?

headline: Super Micro Computer (SMCI) Stock Upgraded to a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy)
summary: The risk-to-reward is starting to look favorable to invest in Super Micro Computer's (SMCI) stock again thanks to the company's continued expansion in the AI realm.
